rust.publish: echo Publishing version ${ pkgFile.version } to GitHub releases
rust.getPublishedVersion: curl -s -L -H "Accept: application/vnd.github+json" -H "X-GitHub-Api-Version: 2022-11-28" "https://api.github.com/repos/zakuciael/${ pkg.pkg }/releases?per_page=5" | jq -r 'if . | length == 0 then . else .[0].tag_name | ltrimstr("v") end'
